*'''''UNIMPLEMENTED''''' }} ==Description== The '''Diveball''' is a type of [[Pokéballs|Pokéball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Pokéball active and there is a remaining supply in the Pokéball selector. ==Details== A specialized Pokéball to capture Pokémon with, it provides an increased catch rate in water environments. ===Rates=== {| class="wikitable" |+ Diveball |- ! Location !! Catch Chance Modifier |- | Water Environments || +15% |- | All other locations || +0% (Equal to Pokéball) |- |} ==Acquisition== '''''UNIMPLEMENTED'''''
